texts.Text: The Shipyard module in a space station oversees design, construction, and maintenance of vessels, featuring cutting-edge technology for efficient operations.
Storages - reliably preserves critical resources and materials, continuously maintaining optimal environmental conditions, full security, and quick access to supplies.
The Stock Exchange - manages trading and resource exchange among stations and factions, ensuring stable economic growth and flexible pricing
The Recruitment Hub facilitates hiring and personnel allocation, enabling stations to swiftly form skilled teams and significantly enhance overall operations.
